divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east on the 2700 block of William Penn Highway in Palmer Township. About a mile away from the light at 25th and William Penn I noticed 10-15 Orange spheres that appeared to be hovering some distance above the Easton Hospital sign. They almost appeared to be radio tower lights on top of a mountain, as they were arranged in two triangular formations, something almost like a hill line. But as I am familiar with the area I knew there is no mountain or anything taller than the sign on the hospital in that direction. As I stopped at the light, I noticed that they were actually moving, fairly rapidly. I made the turn onto 25th st north at this time and tried to keep visual contact with them. As I looped back around I could not find the formation anywhere in the sky. A rough description of the formation is attached. Also immediately after noticing these I posted to facebook, and friends of mine have confirmed the sighting.
